From: KSLawdogg@...

Vehement:



With the Autobot now Maximal  on top of him, Vehement wasn't really in much 
pain, even from the punches.  He felt the urge to laugh at what he considered 
an utterly pathetic attempt to defeat the greatest being in the Universe, 
next to Unicron.

He let go of his sword, it disappearing into subspace.  The right hand that 
was holding it flashed and changed into the shape of a small dagger, a 
glowing energon dagger.  He stabbed the blade that was his hand at the left 
side of Hot Rod's abs.  At the same time he had changed his left arm into the 
shape of a cannon and less than a second after he had moved his right arm to 
stab at Hot Rod he had the left arm head for the ex-Autobot's right abs.
